member.summary: Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.

member.summary: Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.

member.name: P:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.summary: 信云客户端权限刷新验证持久化提供者

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkPersistenceRefreshTokenProvider.#ctor(ThingTalk.OpenApi.Application.Interfaces.IRefreshTokenService)
member.summary: 构造函数之信云客户端权限刷新验证持久化提供者

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkPersistenceRefreshTokenProvider.CreateAsync(Microsoft.Owin.Security.Infrastructure.AuthenticationTokenCreateContext)
member.summary: 用RNGCryptoServiceProvider生成refresh token，并获取相关信息，创建RefreshToken 并调用 IRefreshTokenService.Save() 进行持久化保存。

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkPersistenceRefreshTokenProvider.ReceiveAsync(Microsoft.Owin.Security.Infrastructure.AuthenticationTokenReceiveContext)
member.summary: 调用 IRefreshTokenService.Get() 获取 RefreshToken，用它反序列出生成access token所需的ticket， 从持久化中删除旧的refresh token（刷新access token时，refresh token也会重新生成）。

member.name: T:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkRefreshTokenProvider
member.summary: 信云客户端权限刷新验证提供者

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkApplicationOAuthProvider.ValidateClientAuthentication(Microsoft.Owin.Security.OAuth.OAuthValidateClientAuthenticationContext)
member.summary: 获取客户端的 client_id 与 client_secret 进行验证 client_id: 用户名,企业码 client_secret: 登录密码

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkApplicationOAuthProvider.GrantClientCredentials(Microsoft.Owin.Security.OAuth.OAuthGrantClientCredentialsContext)
member.summary: 对客户端进行授权，授了权就能发 access token, 适用 grant_type: client_credentials

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkApplicationOAuthProvider.GrantResourceOwnerCredentials(Microsoft.Owin.Security.OAuth.OAuthGrantResourceOwnerCredentialsContext)
member.summary: 调用后台的登录服务验证用户名与密码, 适用 grant_type: password

member.name: M:ThingTalk.OpenApi.Providers.ThingTalkApplicationOAuthProvider.GrantRefreshToken(Microsoft.Owin.Security.OAuth.OAuthGrantRefreshTokenContext)
member.summary: 验证持有 refresh token 的客户端
